name: Simple Descompress
short_description:
Instalación (how to install):
- Descomprime (decompress Script)
- como superusuario ejecuta chmod +x sd (running as root chmod + x sd)
- copia el archivo a /usr/bin (copy file to /usr/bin) tambien como root/ also as root

Uso:
sd fichero-comprimido

Use:
sd compress-file


Spanish:

Este script simple ha sido desarollado por "Carlos García Alajarín", con la finalidad de descomprimir de manera rapida y sencilla los tipos de ficheros mas comunes en linux, cabe resaltar que este programa esta inspirado en universal descompress (ud) programa que realizo un amigo mio y en el cual me he basado para desarollar mi version.


English:

This simple script has been developed by "Carlos Garcia Alajarín", in order to decompress fast and the most common types of files in linux way, it should be noted that this program is inspired by universal descompress (ud) program conducted a Friend mine and which I based my version to develop.

Source: http://pastebin.com/zC4BvYpr
